price: 52. „Argi aš nesu geresnis nei šis [Mūsa (Mozė)], kuris yra niekingas ir vos ne vos gali aiškiai išsireikšti?“
arabic: أَمۡ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ مَهِينٞ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُبِينُ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am anā khayrun min hādhā alladhī huwa mahīnun walā yakādu yubīnu
